-ocrat.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who believes in a particular principle of government
-ocrat.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a democrat  (=someone who believes in government by the people)
-ocrat.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a member of a powerful or governing social class or group
-ocrat.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a technocrat  (=a scientist who controls an organization or country)
